name: whoogle
description: Whoogle Search is a self-hosted, ad-free, privacy-respecting metasearch engine that proxies Google results. It strips tracking, blocks ads, supports search filters, and can be used as a default search provider across browsers and devices.
features: Privacy-focused search: Search Google results without tracking, cookies, or personalized ads.
Ad blocking: Automatically remove all advertisements from search results for a cleaner experience.
Tracking removal: Strip tracking parameters and redirects from result URLs to protect privacy.
Custom filters: Configure content filters, safe search settings, and result preferences.
Dark mode: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable searching in any environment.
Search shortcuts: Use bangs and shortcuts for quick searches on specific sites or services.
No JavaScript required: Core functionality works without JavaScript for maximum compatibility and privacy.
Custom CSS: Personalize the appearance with custom stylesheets to match your preferences.
Tor support: Run over Tor network for additional anonymity and privacy protection.
Instance customization: Configure your own instance with custom branding and default settings.
Mobile responsive: Search comfortably on smartphones and tablets with an optimized mobile interface.
OpenSearch integration: Add Whoogle as a search engine in your browser for quick access.
